parameters.name: Elevation
parameters.description: Height of fixture in ft above sea level

parameters.name: Total size
parameters.description: Total size in MB dedicated to all spools on the system

parameters.name: Total size
parameters.description: Total size in MB dedicated to logs

parameters.name: Info logs size
parameters.description: Size in MB dedicated to INFO logs

parameters.name: Error logs size
parameters.description: Size in MB dedicated to ERROR logs

parameters.name: Critical logs size
parameters.description: Size in MB dedicated to CRITICAL logs

parameters.name: Life-cycle logs size
parameters.description: Size in MB dedicated to life-cycle logs

parameters.name: Group
parameters.description: This will be the second segment of the topic to which the node publishes to (example: schenectady-1)

parameters.name: Store-forward size
parameters.description: Size of RAM memory in MB allocated to messages store and forward

parameters.name: Topic
parameters.description: Topic name of data published by this service

parameters.name: Active period
parameters.description: Period of time (in seconds) to determine if the service is down in case it's not publishing data

parameters.name: Topic
parameters.description: Topic name of data published by this service

parameters.name: Active period
parameters.description: Period of time (in seconds) to determine if the service is down in case it's not publishing data

parameters.name: Accumulation interval
parameters.description: Period in minutes at which energy samples are collected and averaged

parameters.name: Accumulation start
parameters.description: Period in minutes at which a new accumulation cycle is started

parameters.name: Report interval
parameters.description: Period in seconds at which accumulated energy data over multiple cycles is reported to the backend

parameters.name: Magnetic flux sample interval
parameters.description: Magnetic flux sample interval in milliseconds

parameters.name: Report interval
parameters.description: Period in minutes at which the environment report is sent to the backend

parameters.name: Temperature spool size
parameters.description: Size of the spool in MB for storing temperature data

parameters.name: Humidity spool size
parameters.description: Size of the spool in MB for storing humidity data

parameters.name: Pressure spool size
parameters.description: Size of the spool in MB for storing pressure data

parameters.name: Acceleration spool size
parameters.description: Size of the spool in MB for storing acceleration data

parameters.name: Magnetic flux spool size
parameters.description: Size of the spool in MB for storing magnetic flux data

parameters.name: Spool ttl
parameters.description: Time to live value in seconds for data in the spools

parameters.name: Spool daily-inc
parameters.description: Size in bytes of environmental data to be accumulated over a day

parameters.name: Threshold ON
parameters.description: Threshold at which the heater turns ON

parameters.name: Threshold OFF
parameters.description: Threshold at which the heater turns OFF

parameters.name: Threshold ON
parameters.description: Threshold at which the heater turns ON

parameters.name: Threshold OFF
parameters.description: Threshold at which the heater turns OFF

parameters.name: Report definition
parameters.description: Definition of the content of the health report

parameters.name: Report interval
parameters.description: Interval in minutes at which the health report is sent to the backend

parameters.description: Definition of the content of the health report

parameters.name: Report interval

parameters.description: Time to live value in seconds for data in the spool

parameters.name: URI
parameters.description: URI of the form mqtt://hostname:port where the MQTT broker is hosted

parameters.description: MQTT TLS version to be used. Default is v1.2
